entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
